project.description: Make git available on this machine. This job is triggered on Jenkins startup.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# install git (and dependencies) to $HOME/git wget http://curl.haxx.se/download/curl-7.30.0.tar.gz -O curl.tgz tar xvf curl.tgz cd curl-7.30.0 ./configure --prefix=$HOME/git make all install cd ..
wget http://sourceforge.net/projects/expat/files/expat/2.0.1/expat-2.0.1.tar.gz/download -O expat.tgz tar xvf expat.tgz cd expat-2.0.1 ./configure --prefix=$HOME/git make all install cd ..
wget https://github.com/git/git/archive/v1.8.2.1.tar.gz -O git.tar.gz tar xvf git.tar.gz cd git-1.8.2.1 C_INCLUDE_PATH=$HOME/git/include LIBRARY_PATH=$HOME/git/lib make prefix=$HOME/git all install cd ..
# save space by deleting the workspace rm -rf *
